text: “E donu, Herod mo Pontius Pilate, mo digau tuadimee huogodoo, mo nia daangada o Israel huogodoo, gu dagabuli mai gi lodo di waahale deenei, gu hai baahi gi Jesus, dau dangada hai hegau dabuaahia dela ne haga menege aga Kooe guu hai di Mesaia.4.27 Matthew 27.1-2; Mark 15.1; Luke 23.1,7-11; John 18.28-29
